title: Your Most Loved Looks From the 2025 Met Gala
description: We asked you to pick your favorite looks. Here are the results.

html:
We asked you to pick your favorite looks. Here are the results.

Your Most Loved Looks From the 2025 Met Gala

We asked you to pick your favorite looks. Here are the results.

Credit...

  • May 6, 2025

One night, $31 million, hundreds of celebrities and your six favorite looks.

On Monday, stars including Madonna and Rihanna walked down the blue carpet to celebrate the Metropolitan Museum of Art’s Costume Institute show “Superfine: Tailoring Black Style.”

Every year we round up photos from the Met Gala. But this year we gave readers the ability to choose their favorite looks from the carpet. And last night, 30,000 readers like you hit the save button 100,000 times. For over five hours, we tracked which looks were the most loved.

Here were the top 10 most saved looks from the evening.

1. Zendaya

The actress wore a fitted white Louis Vuitton suit with a matching hat.

2. Colman Domingo

The Oscar-nominated actor arrived in a royal blue cape, taking it off to reveal this checkered jacket with polka dot accessories designed by Valentino.

3. Lupita Nyong’o

The Oscar winner floated in wearing a mint green Chanel three-piece suit.

4. Janelle Monáe

The multi-hyphenate entertainer defied categorization in an oversize red and blue Thom Browne suit.

5. Doechii

The artist blended two of Louis Vuitton’s signature prints with a monogram belt buckle.

6. Lewis Hamilton

The race car driver, one of this year’s co-chairs, wore a cream Wales Bonner suit and beret.

7. Cardi B

The artist wore a textured green Burberry suit.

8. Jeremy O. Harris

The writer took tailoring to the max in a Balmain blue topcoat and white trousers.

9. Ayo Edebiri

Wearing a custom Ferragamo dress with architectural red beading and a leather jacket, the Emmy Award-winning actress kept it elegant.

10. Regé-Jean Page

A bright red Brioni suit and double-breasted coat blanketed the actor from head to toe.
